title: Title Unknown
description: A posthumous edition of a vertically oriented, rectangular, multicolored abstract woodblock print with mica produced by the artist's son, Onchi Kunio (1920-2001).
dimensions:
paper: H. 27.2 x W. 20.7 cm (10 11/16 x 8 1/8 in.)
printed image: H. 23 x W. 16.5 cm (9 1/16 x 6 1/2 in.)
creditline: Harvard Art Museums/Arthur M. Sackler Museum, Gift of Elizabeth and Neil Swinton
medium: Woodblock print; ink, color, and mica on paper
